imdb.plot outline: Is this dreamy 12-member boy band your favorite group? Want to see more of them? This is your chance to get exclusive behind-the-scenes access to this Korean-Chinese group. Formed in 2011, EXO comprises 12.members who form two sub-groups, the Korean-speaking EXO-K and the Mandarin-speaking EXO-M. Since the group's debut single, "MAMA" in 2012, the group has won numerous awards and enjoyed tremendous commercial success. The reality series will take fans on the members' promotional activities in Korea and abroad and show their hard preparations for their comeback show.

plot: Is this dreamy 12-member boy band your favorite group? Want to see more of them? This is your chance to get exclusive behind-the-scenes access to this Korean-Chinese group.
